title: Perfect low-key first stop
body: Great music at a gentle volume and the staff helped pick a drink.
author: Sam

title: Book a few days ahead
body: Counter seats are best—smoky yakitori and fun sake flight.
author: Leah

title: Peaceful and cute
body: We walked at sunset and grabbed gelato—simple and lovely.
author: M

title: Sweet finish
body: Share the plated dessert, portions are generous.
